Manufacture of Health Foods 

     Wherever the truth is proclaimed, instruction should be given in the preparation of healthful foods. God desires that in every place the people shall be taught to use wisely the products that can be easily obtained. Skilful teachers should show the people how to utilize to the very best advantage the products that they can raise or secure in their section of the country. Thus, the poor, as well as those in better circumstances, can learn to live healthfully. . . . Our work is 
                                                                           41
to show the people how they can obtain and prepare the most wholesome food, how they can co-operate with God in restoring His moral image in themselves. . . .
